Title: Object: March of the Israelites from Egypt
Description: A group of soldiers, followed by a group of people on camels, approaching in a valley, watched by two figures from a steep bank in foreground at right, and a group of soldiers marching with banners behind; trees at right and in middle ground; city beyond walls in the distance; illustration to 'Forget Me Not' (London: 1833, p. 49); after J Martin; proof before title. 1833 Etching and engraving on chine collé
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Charles Rugge Price (estate of)
Acquisition notes: The BM purchased at the sale from the prints sold in bundles rather than in individual lots. It bought lots 47, 106, 352 and 431 in their entirely. It also made selections from lots 1,2,3,5,11,49,50,75,93,107,108,115,116,162,358. It is not easy from the register to work out which prints belonged to which lot.
